sentences.en: Ah done tole Poke ter lay two extry plates fer dem.
sentences.cn: 俺告诉了波克叫他添两份饭啦.

sentences.en: Andy poked the fish with his finger to see if it was still alive.
sentences.cn: 安迪用手指戳了戳那条鱼，看它是否还活着。

sentences.en: Don't poke your umbrella throughthe barsof the lion's cage.
sentences.cn: 别把伞伸进狮笼栏中去.

sentences.en: He has a short fuse , and they poke and prod to see if he will explode.
sentences.cn: 他易于激动, 因此他们故意拨弄他,看看他是否会发火.

sentences.en: He saw the dog's twitching nose poke out of the basket.
sentences.cn: 他看到那只狗一抽一抽的鼻子从篮子里冒出来。

sentences.en: John smiled at them and gave Richard a playful poke.
sentences.cn: 约翰冲着他们笑了笑，开玩笑地捅了理查德一下。

sentences.en: Lindy poked him in the ribs.
One of the nurses poked her head around the door.
sentences.cn: 其中一名护士从门里探出头来。

sentences.en: Prissy burst into tears and incoherent mumblings: " Poke!
sentences.cn: 百里茜也放声大哭,断断续续地咕囔着: " 波克!

sentences.en: She should know better than to poke the animal with her umbrella.
sentences.cn: 她应当知道不该用伞去捅动物.

sentences.en: Then he took a poke at my hair, telling me I looked like a scarecrow!
sentences.cn: 然后他开始嘲笑我的头发, 说我看起来像个稻草人!

sentences.en: Vanessa gave me a playful poke in the ribs.
sentences.cn: 瓦妮莎开玩笑地戳了一下我的肋骨。

sentences.en: We don't like strangers who poke their noses into our affairs.
sentences.cn: 我们不喜欢陌生人干预我们的事务。

sentences.en: We hadn't been able to poke our heads out and see what was going on.
sentences.cn: 我们无法伸出头去，看看发生了什么。

sentences.en: We never thought she would poke her nose into this.
You like to poke your nose into other people's business.
sentences.cn: 你喜欢干涉别人的事情.
你抱住她的脚, 波克.

words.tran_cn: 拨火棍；纸牌戏；（用棍）戳的人

phrases.tran_cn: 用恶作剧的方式来取笑；戏弄

trans.tran_en: to quickly push your fingers, a stick etc into something or someone
to quickly push your finger or some other pointed object into something or someone
to quickly push your finger or some other pointed object into something or someone

trans.tran_cn: 刺，戳，刺探，干涉，伸出，闲逛
trans.tran_en: to move or push something through a space or opening
to quickly push your finger or some other pointed object into something or someone
